snippet: Gilberto Suarez, a Florida man who pleaded guilty to helping smuggle the Los Angeles Dodgers slugger Yasiel Puig out of Cuba, was sentenced by a federal judge to one month in prison followed by five months of house arrest.
lead_paragraph: Gilberto Suarez, a Florida man who pleaded guilty to helping smuggle the Los Angeles Dodgers slugger Yasiel Puig out of Cuba, was sentenced by a federal judge to one month in prison followed by five months of house arrest.
